# init(coder:)

**Initializer**

Creates a reference-library view controller from data in an unarchiver.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(coder: NSCoder)
```

## Creating a reference-library view controller

- **dictionaryHasDefinition(forTerm:)**: Returns whether a definition is available for the given term.
- **init(term:)**: Initializes a newly created reference-library view controller to display the definition of the given term.

items.description: Returns whether a definition is available for the given term.
